Posts.Content: Hello everyone Am home a week today and everything is going well I think but for one thing peeing I just cant control it. I will not go out knowing I am leaking I have a pad on but I know its leaking. The things am doing to try and stop this are pelvic exercise and cut away down on liquids. If anyone can help me please send a reply steviez
Posts.Title: peeing

Posts.Content: under a week and am in and out opt over today has been a long one taxi's planes and more taxi's am tired and sore but each day is getting better all I need now is the cath out. I wouldn't wish this on anyone from the day I was told and then the waiting the opt which took 5 hours and now I have to wait 2 weeks on the results. The good thing is its out and to the Doctors and Nurses at the Cambridge Hospital M4 they Wonderful and am not long home and they have got in contact with me. This is a Big Thank You to all the staff on ward M4 at Cambridgeshire Hospital Steviez
Posts.Title: got home

Posts.Content: Prostate, I went to the doctor with something simple that's what I was thinking and with in 7/8 weeks got my results gleason score of 7 up to this point I didn't visit the doctors a lot. And I still don't like going but its a must am going over to Cambridge for my opt on the 7 of this month election day and I don't know what to expect its keyhole am going for and may be treatment after . Could anyone tell me how long it will be before things get back to normal, steviez
Posts.Title: Prostate

Posts.Content: Well folks am in the hospital and waiting for the opt tomorrow morning and have no notion of sleeping it's going to be a long night I have to say pamperton house is very nice the room is clean and well persented. The kitchen has a microwave fridge and its up to each person to make the most of it . I wish yous all well especially those who took the time to reply to my post Steviez

Posts.Title: Prostate

Posts.Content: Allen as far as I can remember it was 3+4 the way I have looked at it is, that's the hand I was delt and it's one I must win and the reason I came to this site is to chat to others who have the same problem cus others have been here and done that. The worst thing at the min is thinking about the opt, I have never had one before. And as for the cancer I try not to dwell on it, and as for the Gleason score I don't know what the numbers mean hopefully you can tell me in laymens terms. Steviez

Posts.Title: Prostate

Posts.Content: Well I went in yesterday and got the prostate out am pretty sore at the min the doc said its looking good but I still have 2 Weeks to wait for the results this is the big wait anyone who's going there, you do come out the other side of the opt am still on the mainland until Sunday
Posts.Title: It's behind me now
